content.rendered:
The Punto tub chair is constructed from a rubber wood frame, the most ecologically friendly timber, which is then stained to mahogany.

 

Finished in a hard wearing faux-leather with attractive stitching detail.  Two colours available; chocolate brown or ivory.

The ranges fire retardant faux leather facings are produced to withstand the considerable demands of daily use making this chair suitable for heavy commercial use.
